content.detailedDescription: This could be classified as old news, but i feel that i at least need you to know about it. this is about 2 seperate sightings in 2 different geografical locations. the common denomiter, being the size and shape. one sighting in broad day light and the other at a predawn hour. the one in indiana first; this was a bright and sunny day for the most part. my spouse and i were returning from an outing at a reservoir known as misenewah, i believe is the spelling, east of peru. friends gathered there for a typical day, but the weather was cool and the outing was ended early. my wife and i were in route back to kokomo, in. where we lived and i worked. in the fall the crops were gathered and corn stalks had been chopped down, revealing flat farm country. the road we were on passed by these fields, and we were traveling in an easterly direction. we were just enjoying the day and the country side as in lay, just before severe winter weather set in. out of nowhere, a very large shadow passed over us, slowly, traveling in the same direction that we were traveling. we were traveling at aproximately 35-40 mph and slowed as we observed what had just passed overhead. we were shocked at the least and awed at what we had just seen. i remember 2, but my wife says 3 craft flying in formation, at an altitude of aproximately 30 feet. rather than gaze upon the 3 craft, i homed in on the one closest to us to note as much as i could about it. what struck me the most was how something this big, could stay airborn at this slow speed. it was delta shaped, drab colored, width at widest point somewhere around 60 feet. there was absolutely no noise or turbulance being generated. this seemed odd at this low altitude. i noticed no markings of any kind. also, i was taken back at the size of a large rectangular opening at the rear of the craft. the opening was about 1/4 the total width of the craft and almost he same heigth as the thickness of the craft. i noticed no tail fins. we slowed to a crawl as we observed they continued in an easterly direction, in an aproximate direction of grissom afb. we observed them till they were out of sight; the duration lasting some minutes. what has stuck in my head was the size, the shape, absense of noised and turbulance at this close proximity to the ground, and how they stayed in the air at this slow speed. they were close enough that the nearest one could almost be touched. the second sighting preceeded this one, was in either the late 70's or early 80's, and was in a different part of the country. i worked in a steel mill in birmingham, alabama, and my starting time was 6:30 a.M. as i lived some distance feom my work, it required me to leave early in the morning hours to arrive there on time. the sighting was in an area close to the garden city exit on i 65. there was not a lot of traffic due to the hour. i topped a small hill,headed south, droped into a dip and ran under something. i noticed an 18 wheeler at the same time running under it also, headed north, at the same time. there were dim lights shinning down. the shape that i noticed, although it was dark, beyond the lights was again delta or triangular shaped. it was about 50 feet from the ground when we ran under it in opposite directions. again, no noise, no turbulance. as the 18 wheeler and i topped the hills on both sides of the dip, in opposite directions, we stopped and observed the craft. it rose about 1000 feet, rotated about 90 degrees, and disappeared faster than you could blink an eye, in an easterly direction. the acceleration from dead still to out of sight in less than a second or two shocked me. the truck driver and i conversed on cb radios to verify what we had just seen. i have only spoken with few people about this, as i dont want to be lumped into a group that people think are nuts. i have seen other phenominom such as fire balls following power lines, fox fires, aurora borealis, and the like. what i have seen resembled none of this. it was real and exists. there is something deffinitely out there. for whatever it's worth, i hope that this aids you in some part.
content.summary: Returning from an outing with friends

content.detailedDescription: At approx 1:54 am tonight 7-14-07 was coming home in coldwater and happened to see a bright orange flash to my right. i looked up amd saw what looked like a hung ball on fire (or the color of flames) way up in the sky. it was flashing as though it was on fire traveling about 10 miles an hour floating to the north east direction. it never changed speed and at one point it appeared to have falling dabree that as it fell, burned itself out as it floated towards earth. i am not a drinker by the way. wondering if you got any other reports on this? i did send this email to channel 3 news. my friend that was with me as he was driving also saw this. his name is spenecr brayton.  it was comning from the direction of bater road where over the past quite a few years has had many numerious reported sitings with one possable abduction. thank you.
content.summary: Round ball like then to star shape

content.detailedDescription: Well it was monday nite july 2nd , i had just returned home from dropping off my girl friend at home, as far as the time i arrived at home had to be id say from about 10:30 to about 11:00 pm to the best of my knowledge, so, then i got out of my car when in my house to open door get in side to get what i needed cigerete get soda from in house then come back out side only after about 10 min had gone by since id gotton back, so i walked around the front of my trailor house put the radio on in my car listioned to radio got bored by it so i got out of my car i looked up the the left of the sky while i saw a bright round glowing object getting going from btite to dim off and on while the object unbelievable to my eyes it was about 12:00 clock high in the night sky moving around in a clock wise postion,while slowly it was moving it then moved to 6:00 oclock postion while moving around in circles at that postion,while the glow of object still intermitting glowing, then it moved to 9:00 clock postion still spining around clockwise then it spent a little time there moved next to the 3:00 clock postion in the sky then then continued with intermitting glowing getting brite to dim then disapeared in the sky i would say about 220 degrees south west i know the direction was right when i last saw it cuse my satalite dish is pointed to 220 degrees south west, also id like to point out here very important it was moving around in circles clockwise while traveling to the south west area in the night sky at same time i was so amazed to see this site when it was at 12:00 clock high it dropped stait down like a direct line from 12:00 postion to 6:00 oclock  postion i was wow also there was no sound of the object so i got phone called 911 police came filled out report but object was gone before they arrived but i saw the object for good 30 min still im amazed what i saw also i i know all about ufos so i knew what i saw was not an airplane was a real ufo space ship one last point it seemed maybe the flight patterns was due to maybe navigation problems or was having problems cuse it was moving around oddly as if it was having trouble on board or something , but i got the feeling what ever ufo piolet who was running ship i feel was maybe trying to send message with the cirlce flight patterns it was making in the sky, but yes this sighting of mine did happan ill never for get it cuse stars dont move but this ufo was awesome to see.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Saw glowing white round object  in night shy  getting brite & dim while object  was moving around  in circles

content.detailedDescription: While on a road trip with my husband we decided to stop for the night near hope b.C canada and just take our sleeping bags into the forest next to the highway. it was a warm, nice night with a very clear sky. when we had found a comfortable spot on the forest floor we lay on our backs and looked at the stars through the open canopy in the trees. this is when we saw what looked like a star but moving very fast and changing directions instantly. it could cross the whole night sky in a blink and was very graceful. there is no way this was a satelite,plane or anything else of that sort as its speed was immense and its agility like nothing else. my husband had seen these earlier with a co-worker in langley b.C canada but i had missed that experience so it was a delight to finally see them for myself. i think we must have watched it dance in and out of our line of vision for a very long time as we fell asleep talking about it. part of me didnt 100% conclude it was anything alien until a few years later when i read other peoples descriptions of what is sometimes referred to as fastwalkers. it was exactly like those. since then i have noticed them at on at least two other occasions in bc canada and have talked to people who have described the exact same thing to me without me communicating my story to them first,indicating a tantalizing truth!
content.summary: Super fast star like object

content.detailedDescription: First let me thank you for allowing me to express my self obout my sightings.I have a hobby i love to fly home made kites since my childhood  so ever since i can remember i have been seeing this ufo's so i use my kite as reference to spot them more easily  so my last sighting happened when i was cleaning the front porch after a while took a break with my binoculares began to just scan the sky within ten minutes i spotted them by theway it was quite windy  so this objets  were no ballons  i know if you watch them long enough you can actually see them change shapes yes i said shapes even colors from bright red to orange from white to silver and some times something drops from them i dont know what it is but is sphere shaped but smaller. if anybody is curious about what i am seeing please contact me any time after 4pm i'll be glad to talk to you.               as to what i was thinking  all i could say as i was watching them was wish tracy could come and see this tracy is my girlfriend she has seen them quite often also she could tell you some stories about the same objets that i see when i first met her i told her obout this things that i have been seeing so one time me and her went to a nearby school to fly one my kites she stayed inside the van reading a book  while i flew my kite obout ten minutes later i called her  to come over to where i was laying on the ground i asked her to look with the binoculares  at the kite then i told her to look just to right of the kite i asked her what do you see her jaw dropped then she asked me what the heck is that joking i answer her i dont see nothing then i said to her that is what i have been seeing all the time now you know thank you very much and we have see them all the time after that i am used to seeing them i would like very much to talk to mufon soon thank you .
content.summary: I saw three 3 silvery spheres just motionless then two more then they just vanished. to whom it may concern i see them all of the time if you are interested in seeing them let me know i will show you how thank you.

content.detailedDescription: Standing outside in the front of the house saying goodbye to a friend and noticed 2 objects overhead.......If stars are the size of a dime these were the size of a quarter.......They flew very fast and disappeared over the horizon.........They were kind of triangular in shape and had a milky white light around them.
content.summary: 2 objects one ahead of the other flew overhead very fast and disappeared over the horizon

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting outside in the garage and 4 orange spheres appeared around 9:00 pm above my neighbor house at a 45* angle . they appeared to be glowing almost like a hazy plasma flame around each craft, all the craft were flying north in close staggered formation less than 500 feet from the ground and the size of each craft is hard to determine, but i would say about the size of a small aircraft . i was scared , i ran inside and told my  mother who was a skeptic and grab my camera, i ran outside with my mother and took a few pics but i was nervous and shaking to get a good shot and they were going away by the time i can get a good shot lined up, they blink out one at a time, i snapped 4 pics in normal mode and in night framing mode only one shot came out decent, i could not believe what i just witnessed and then  all 4 appeared again at 9:36 pm in the same formation and going in the same direction as before , this time i was ready with the camera, i took close up shots, and they show the plasma flame around each craft. i have 9 photos in total showing different formation flying, i am an aerospace engineering student who studies engines and different forms of propulsion and i know these were not conventional aircraft by any means.4
content.summary: 4 orange glowing  plasma shperes  in lemont il

content.detailedDescription:
On july 11th 2007, at around 4:45pm, i was on my way to work in long beach california from my home in cypress california. i was driving down wardlow street just before you start to drive through el dorado park, when i was briefly blinded by an extremely bright, silver object in the sky in front of me. if i held my hand up toward the windshield, it would have been around the size of my thumb. after the bright flash stopped, i thought i was looking at a large metal blimp but then, as i was looking at it, it disappeared. a second or two later, the flash happened again, this time when the flash stopped, it looked like a disc shaped fling saucer or something. i became scared a bit, but put on the brakes anyway to watch it. it didn't seem to be moving during the whole encounter until now the front end (or the end on my left hand side) rose up a bit. it seemed to drop down a little. after that, it flashed again, disappeared, came back, flashed again, then disappeared for good. i sat there looking all over it and couldn't see it anywhere.

i proceeded to head to work and called my wife. i was a little overwhelmed when i called her. after i told her i felt very stupid. i then told some others at my job and felt stupid then too. 

i know there is an airport in long beach. i tried to tell myself that that is what i saw, that i just saw a weird plane maybe. but i honestly cannot account for what i saw. i was never going to talk about it again until my wife place the laptop on my lap opened to this page. she really wanted me to share, i just don't know what i saw. it wasn't a blimp and it wasn't a plane.   i do feel stupid still and now i know why people don't come forward when they see something.
content.summary: Flashing flying disc

content.detailedDescription:
At 5:06 pacific time, i saw was outside our house having a smoke and a bright object in the northeast caught my eye. i thought it was a glider or hot air balloon. when it moved to the south after 15 minutes of watching it, i thought it was a planet. i checked the 'day' sky charts and no planets were in that area. when i went outside 10 minutes later it was gone. i attributed it to high cloud cover. then, i went outside again after 30 minutes and i saw it move from the area i last saw it and it streaked southwest within 5 seconds over the horizon. 5 minutes later it was where i last saw it. it moved 3 times to the south west from the original position. the fourth time it did this, it was approaching the horizon, then it moved upwards towards my zenith and disappeared. the next time i saw it, it was south of south west, then it did the same thing 3 times as before. it kept moving west. so, i asked my son to come out and look at this object at least 4 times during all of this. he saw it and asked, "what is it?" i couldn't give him an answer. we saw it move to the south west twice. i decided to look to the west and my son and i saw at least 12 different object flying around "near" the sun. the brightness they gave off was unusual because most objects, like birds, planes, etc have shadows when you view them against the sun. my son has better vision than i have (he has 20-10 vision from the last eye exam), and he saw 3 engines on each of them.

we watched these objects dance around. two objects were rectangular and rotated as they moved. the last time i saw one of the objects was around 8:11 pm pacific time.

there were so many of them that we lost count. based on the behaviour of these objects, i can only deduce that there was a conscious force involved because all the "fluffies" floating around near our house was not moving as the same as these objects. the wind speed was near nil. a lot of these objects moved and disappeared to the south. from the first one that i saw, almost all were located in the west. i kept checking all around the sky to see if there was any other activity going on. there was none. these objects congregated around the vicinity of the sun in the sky.

there have been reports of crop circles in our area over the years, especially around vanderhoof, bc.

if anyone has connections here in my area, please look into it. it was unreal that these objects were brighter than the sun and any other objects i saw in the sky. one thing to note. a single propeller plane flew northwest over my house and one of these bright lights looked like it was intercepting the plane's course.

the last time i encountered something like this was when i was 5 years old. the bright object flew over our truck as we were driving home, late at night. it didn't have a sound at all and it was moved very fast.
content.summary: Sighting in prince george, bc, canada

content.detailedDescription:
One night in june, a friend  of mine and my nephew hiked into the forest for a night of camping.We got to the backpackers parking lot around 10:00pm and hiked for about 1 hour into the forest.
nothing unusual was happening, we set up camp and ate our dinner. my friend was playing his guitar and my nephew had already went to sleep in his own tent.
around 11:30 i started saying to my friend " i feel very strange, i feel as if something enormous is about to happen in the world" these were my exact words and i felt very strange almost dizzy and light headed.
we then hear coyotes yelping and getting very close to us, then silence and as i shined my flashlight into the woods i could see their eyes reflecting the light. this really spooked us since i had already felt  strange prior to hearing the howling of the coyotes.
they did not harm or get close to us but we were still spooked so we decided to get into the tent to go to sleep.
we were sleeping top to tail, i was at the opposite end of the tent and after a few minutes my tent mate wakes me up saying that he saw lights (headlights) shining through the  top of the tent and that my face and chest were specifically illuminated. we both get up and open the tent window to see a bright amber orange light shining directly at us about 20 feet away. i panic thinking someone is here to cause us harm and then i notice the light begins to slowly move upwards into the tree tops and i then noticed 2 more lights of the same color but were smaller. 
there was a large center light and 2 smaller lights on each side of the larger center light. i get out to take a closer look and i notice that as this thing comes down again it is actually small car tire sized little craft of some sort slowly moving up, down to the left, right and sometimes hovering in place for a few seconds and then moving again.It's movements were very slow and smooth as if gliding on ice.
at first we were both almost frozen with fear but after a few minutes i got the feeling that everything was ok and that whatever this thing was it was not going to hurt us.
we continued to watch if for about 1 hour and at then we became so tired we went right to sleep. the very next morning we wrote down and drew pictures of what we had seen. we both saw this thing and it was clearly a small little craft with 3 lights. i don't know what it was or where it came from but i saw it.
i am not looking for any kind of attention i just want to report what i saw so that if anyone else has seen something like this maybe they will come forward and report it.
this is for real and the leaders need to come clean!!
thanks
content.summary: Small ufo in the shawnee national forest

content.detailedDescription:
I was working near waterbeach army base in cambridgeshire england and we were having realy bad weather and i was just taking photos of the clouds.
i didn't see it untill i looked at the photos.
content.summary: Did not seeit until i looked at photos i had tken of the clouds.

content.detailedDescription:
in the summer of 2005, i was walking my two dogs, facing the southern sky. i was 13 years old and it happened in the late afternoon/early evening. 
 it was on a street in medford, oregon. i was almost at the end of the street. where i was walking i could see the natural geological formations, the table rocks. i was looking around, enjoying the day, when i saw the ufo.
 it was disc-shaped with 5 large windows going horizontally across it. it was just hovering in the sky. it was not close; however i'm not a good judge of distance so i can't really say how close it was to me. 
 i wondered if it was indeed an ufo. perhaps it was a reflection off of a mirrored surface, i just don't know. i've come to believe it was an ufo but i understand completely that i could be wrong. i try to not let my x-files dvds bias me.
 the craft just hovered there. i thought it might be a helicopter but this thing wasn't moving at all. a car was turning onto the street i was on so i had to quickly grab my dogs' leashes. when i looked back, i swear that the craft had managed to move about 100 ft. in just a few seconds without making noise.
 the ufo hovered for about 3 minutes total then from the two most outer windows it slowly vanished. i've thought that maybe it was just a reflection of sunlight, vanishing because the sun was going down. but the sun was still quite above the horizon.
 during my viewing of this craft i felt excited and curious. i wasn't afraid. it seemed to pose no threat and, like i said, it simply disappeared. i've only told 3 or so people and now i'm 15. i still live in medford, or. this has been my only personal viewing of an ufo.
content.summary: Disc-shaped ufo with 5 large windows that i saw appear then vanish in 2005.

content.detailedDescription: When we lived in kansas in the early 1960s as small children. we used to live on the north end of great bend, kansas on the north end of morton st. one night in 1964 or 65, i looked out of the kitchen window and saw a white cube that glowed like a light bulb. it was a perfectly shaped cube and not at all blurry. it had a red light glowing on the inside of it and the outer surface seemed to glisten. there are or were quite a few radio towers there and one huge tv 2 tower farther to the north. the cube shaped thing flew around that radio tower like a moth flies around a light bulb of all things, only slower than a moth and it never hit the tower. i ran to get my dad but he said don't brother him right now. so i ran back to the kitchen yelling for my two brothers to come here. when i got back to the window it was still flying near the tower. just before my brothers got to the window it came across the field then towards me and it started hovering around 75 feet above the ground maybe 200 yards away. that is when my two brothers made it to the window and started saying what is that, what is that? also, i might add that the red light was fading on an off like the tower light was. i believe perhaps it was trying to communicate with it. then it spun so fast that it turned into a ball and in a white streak it went almost straight up but at a little angle towards the north west and was gone. we saw what we saw so because of that i know we are not alone. sure makes you wonder why that thing was flying around that radio tower? i can also tell you that well we did anyway, still had black and white tv as it was still the early years for tv. the large tv 2 tower first broadcast was nov. 28, 1954. just for the fact that signals can travel at the speed of light and maybe it too could travel at or near the speed of light too. then maybe it could have came from a near by star system that would be within 5 or 6 light years from us? but if it was a craft or a type of probe that was just passing by then who knows where it could have came from? another possibility is that, what if it was some type of life form itself? and it roams the cosmos like the buffalo roomed our prairies long ago? i have done my homework on about everything it could have been and my conclusion is that it was extraterrestrial, why? because the thing i saw showed intelligence and there is no doubt about it. i know it was looking at things by the way it was behaving. at the north end of the street was a wheat field then to the north edge of that about 1 mile is the dry walnut creek and on the north edge of that was the radio tower. the radio tower was around one and a quarter mile from the kitchen window where i first saw it. the houses including ours 15 houses or so lined up along the wheat field east and west. the houses that are there now in the field were not there back then. here is the part that i did not include, when i got back to the window it just moved off the tower and was spinning (like a white glowing box spinning) it was spinning towards the south southeast towards town. then it turned toward the west very quickly and staying over the field run along the row of houses staying out over the field around 200 yards or so and up in the air like i said around 75 feet. when it saw me looking out the window like i said, it stopped and that is when my 2 brothers made it to the window and started saying what is that, what is that? to me that shows a form of intelligence don't you think? it was about the size of a small box truck like but it might have been a little smaller? this is all a true story and i wanted to share it. we were young when we seen this but we knew it was very strange.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Great bend, kansas ufo

content.detailedDescription:
While taking the garbage for next day curbside pickup at 22:00 hour (10:00 pm) on 07/11/2007, i spotted a very bright light in the sky in the direction of the venice municipal airport. it first appeared to be a planet like object similar to venus in the night sky; however, much larger and brighter. i stood starring for about 5 minutes until i realized it was moving away from me as it began to drop below the tree top level.

i ran inside to get my binoculars and returned. it had moved only slightly. viewing it through 6 x 30 binoculars proved it was not an aircraft (i see small aircraft with their red and green running lights every day & night since the venice airport is home to many private craft including jet aircraft).

although in the direction of the airport i could easily determine that it was well beyond since i could see small craft landing during the event. i then decided to take a picture and ran back in the house a second time for the digital camera. by this time the object had moved some distance from the original sighting position so the pictures were barely discernible. i ran the pictured through my graphics software enhancing the object. it was circular in shape and emitted a bright glowing light as if it were a glowing white ball and appeared to be much larger than the small craft flying in the area. the event lasted approximately 15 minutes.

over the years i have seen many of these kinds of object including bright orange circular craft as well as black triangular craft beginning in 1955 to present. i have many ufo stories much stranger than the most recent sighting.
content.summary: Bright object hovered for 20 minutes

content.detailedDescription: I went to check on my cat, who had just been hit by a car (its an outdoor cat) and i open the door and right over the trees in front of my house is a big white / orange light. this is the second time this week i have seen this light in roughly the same area, and i have seen it on the other side of town once prior to the past 2 events about 2-3 weeks back. it caught my eye both nights because it was to bright to be a star, to close as well, and also to quiet to be a helicopter or airplane. im not to good with direction, i think it might of been twords gentry direction, i dont know if this is associated with the other gentry sighting i saw on ur page. but if it is, this could help confirm something. the object hoverd for a bit and i turned on the portch light, and i could see it kind of move in a circle slowly, then slowly went down behind the trees, this was over a period of 15-20 mins. on both nights it remained roughly the same time.  it kind of gave me an uneasy feeling to watch, but yet i was so intrigued by it. my fiance saw it the first night as well, but she wasnt able to watch it the whole time like i did.
content.summary: Ufo seen over trees for 2nd time

content.detailedDescription: 1957 was off for final exams,went camping at mount airy forest,used friends mopet bike to get there,after getting there rode down path about one half mile. saw big clearing stopped and began to set tent up,friend was suppose to meet me there. sit in camping chair listing to radio,went inside tent to git sandwhich,radio begin acting up and then stopped.Radio was warm to the touch,but the radio was in shade. picked up radio to take battiers out thats when i saw it. five hundred feet back at least. in clearing i know was not there when i set tent up. walked back to five feet of starship, no sound. could see threw it like glass.Went to walk away thats when ramp slide out from no where. heard voice in head asking me to come in.Got scared went to turn to walk away that when something warm and cold touched the right side of head,just below ear lobe.Everything went black.Woke up leaning agains tree near street,but back far enought not to be seen. looked at watch stopped. walked back to tent. radio was playing good as new. star ship was gone,clearing was now filled with tall grass when i first got there.Took everything down,placed on bike. friend did not show.Got home by 1130.Went inside took bath.Went to lay down and for some reason i looked at date. it was not friday but saturday i had lost 24 hours. i was 14 at the time. there is more to story but would fill at least 2 more pages or more.You have my number and email if you have a 1-800 number i would be willing to call you and tell you the rest of story
content.summary: Went camping,half mile into forest,sent up tent,turned around star ship sitting 500 feet into woods

content.detailedDescription:
Approximately 12:45 am in the morning my brother stopped outside for a cigarette. he said that he spotted a "glowing" orb above the trees, but thought it was the moon or a street-light, initially. the night was hazy. he went inside to get a camera (still thinking it was a "blood-moon"), came back out and took a snap shot. he states that he still did not believe that it was a ufo, so he went back inside to go to the bathroom. when he looked at the photograph after going to the restroom, he figured it was too different to be the moon on a hazy night. he stopped back outside to the spot and started looking for the object again, but it was nowhere to be found. 

my brother states that he feels "apprehensive" about looking out his window - thinking that he's gotten as close as he wants too.
content.summary: Glowing orb spotted at edinboro university

content.detailedDescription: The humanoid was luminescent and floating inside the sphere, coming towards me and my brothers,we noticed a mist when the object appeared.
content.summary: A luminescent humanoid floating inside the sphere

content.detailedDescription:
We were up very late on july 7,2007.  i had fixed dinner and everyone ate except for my husband.  our dog was giving birth at the time and he was down in the field tending to her.  i decided to go down and check on the progress of the dog and to tell my husband that i'd stay with her while he went up to the house to eat dinner.  he left me with a flashlight and went on up to the house to eat.  it was roughly 1:10-1:15am (so it was now 07/08/07).  i grew up here, i know the area well, so being alone in the dark didn't bother me.  i used the flashlight to look at the one puppy that had been born.  i petted our dog & i decided to turn off the flashlight to save the batteries.  i was seated on the ground next to our dog.  behind me was a very small barn, it used to be a goat/pony barn.  it's roughly 12'x20'.  and only about 5'tall.  even when sitting on the ground, i could clearly see all of the night sky.  it was a very clear night and all the stars were visible.(we have no street lights, or anything like that.  this is a rural area up a hollow w/woods on each side)  the dog and i were inside the lot (fence) that surrounds two sides of the little barn.  my husband had taken out the other dogs that had been in the lot and he had left the two fence openings open.  as i sit beside of the laboring dog (in the dark) i listened to the tiny trickle of the creek in front of us and could hear "critters" in the woods.  none of our dogs were barking, so i wasn't worried. 
we have been watching a show on tv in which the guy gets dumped out in the middle of nowhere & always finds his way back to civilization in a couple of days.  he looks to the stars and tells you to look for the north star if you're lost.  since it was a very clear night, i decided to try & find the north star.  easier said than done!  i didn't know which one it was!  i kept looking around (about 5 to 10 min.)and was enjoying the beauty of the heavens.  when i looked back to my right, i noticed a brilliant light that hadn't been there.  it was definitely within our atmosphere & wasn't a star.  then i noticed that it seemed to be coming my direction.  it was clearly an aircraft of some sort, not a shooting star, meteor, fireworks, flare,  etc.  i looked for the flashing lights that accompany a helicopter, jet, airplane, etc.  there were no flashing lights.  as it came into view, i could clearly make out 3 very bright white circular lights on the bottom only of the craft. no other lights on the sides, top or elsewhere.  the lights were arranged in a triangular shape.  the one light in the front was in the direction in which it was going, with the other two lights behind it(one to the left & one to the right: thus forming a triangle arrangement).  they were evenly spaced from each other & were so bright!  it only took maybe 20-30 seconds? from when i first saw it: being a small bright light to being clearly visible and flying towards me. it came from the south and flew to a slight northwest. (i'm judging the directions based on where the sun comes up and sets here, it may not be exact.) i was freaked out and scared to death!  here i was about 200ft. away from the house(the house is up a hill too) & i was all alone.  my husband wouldn't be back for another 15 or 20 min. and he had no idea what was happening!  i didn't turn on my flashlight because i did not want it to detect me & end up directly over top of me!  as i sit on the ground, i turned to watch this thing.   i watched it come closer and it kept on flying at an even speed, with no dipping or turning.  it was clearly flying at an even distance from the ground, not like something falling from the sky.  it continued on passing to my right.  i had decided i was getting the hell outta there!  the last time i laid eyes on it, it was passing behind the trees (but still clearly visible and was still heading in the nw? direction).  it was still up pretty high, as high as a high flying helicopter i guess. (i'd say at arm's length, it would have taken a quarter to have covered it up.)  as i started out of the fenced lot, it was still visible and i could hear the low sound of it flying through the air.  i was too panicked to take the time to see if i could make out an outline of the craft.  i ran as fast as i could to the house.  when i made it in the door i was saying "oh my god, oh my god, oh my god!"   (we are temporarily living with my parents) & everyone was asking what was wrong. "ufo!!!" i managed to spit out and i started to cry.  i was so shook up. i felt stupid, but i know what i saw and the extreme fear i felt was real!  my heart was racing, not just from running, but from being so scared. i managed to make a sketch of the lights i saw, although  my hands were shaking like they've never shook in my life.  my heart continued to race for another hour & a half.  i was hot, shaking, my face and neck was splotched red, and i also felt like i needed to throw up.  it took a couple of hours before i calmed down.
i would like to know if anyone else witnessed this, but i'm afraid to notify local authorities about it. it would surely be in the local newspaper!  and i'd rather not have that kind of attention!  the time would have been approx. 1:30am on july 8, 2007.
content.summary: Aircraft w/3 very bright circular lights on bottom that were in a triangular formation.

content.detailedDescription: On porch having a cigarette,oval white with tiny trail,meteor?Moving southwest to northeast like a jet with no sound,five seconds then gone heading toward earth
content.summary: White oval withtiny trail

content.detailedDescription:
I was about six, and my father and i were going to the top of 49th st, which was the highest point in our neighborhood, and i got to sit on his shoulders.  i don't know how everyone knew a flying saucer was going to be in the sky, but the dads were on the hill which was most unusual.  we waited and the men were laughing standing thinking they were going to see a flying saucer, and then there it was, silver, and the dad's decided it must be the sun reflection on the object.  we all watched this thing that went from east to west, higher than anything we had ever seen in the sky. no noise, not moving all that fast, but faster than a plane of the time, so we watched it move over the sky for about 4 to 5 minutes.  we were in awe, no one spoke and when it was gone, the men said, wow, do you believe what we just saw, it wasn't a joke, but no one was afraid, and everyone was asking each other "well, what the hell do you think that was?"  i am not sure what my dad thought, but i was sure i had seen flying saucer.  now, ufo had not been coined then and the old radio shows had flying saucer all the time, so i don't think anyone was that impressed.  we went home and my mother said, well, fool did you see a flying saucer, and my dad said yes we had and then he laughed, and described it to her.  
so at 6yrs old, i can't tell you how it was received, we all clapped, and yelled at it, but i never knew if everyone wanted to admit that they thought it was a flying saucer.  i do know that somehow my father knew it crashed. he was mostly an information gatherer.  he told me the saucer we saw had crashed, and it was not mentioned again.  i of course was crushed knowing that it would not be back.

jane hart
content.summary: Observation of flying saucer

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were walking the dogs north along west shore drive.  at or about 6:55 pm i noticed a dark, small object low in the sky.  at first, i thought it to be somebody's kite that had become loose.  as it approached, i observed it was a rectangular object about 6 feet by 4 feet, dark gray in color.  it made no noise whatever.  conditions were sunny and dry.  there was an intermitant small breeze.  the object approached to within 50 feet of my location and was about 50 feet up.  it seemed to have yellow reflectors at each corner which caught sunlight.  the object made small jerking motions and revealed itself in profile as well as full face.  it was thin, probably no thicker than an inch.  there were no wires nor strings attached.  at the point closest to me, it seemed to hang in the air.  i kept waiting for it to fall, but it did not.  finally, it moved beyond a tree line and i saw it no longer.  it was one of the most odd things i have ever seen.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Observed rectangular object in the sky which had no apparent reason to be airborne

content.detailedDescription:
after conducting fire training operations for new firefighters, my crew was refilling our pumper/tanker at a hydrant located at the intersection of bonanza dr and morganton rd. it was dark, save for the light of the streetlamps and from the apparatus (our emergency lights were not on).  
    since this a relatively mundane operation and i was confident with the skills of the recruits, i stood to the side watching them and looking around.
    suddenly, from the north, a green light appeared and traveled from horizon to horizon (north to south) in less than 2 seconds. the object traveled in a straight line, silently, with little or no tail trailing it. 
     at first i was stunned, not sure if i had really seen it. then i thought it was a "shooting star" but it did not appear as any shooting star i had seen in the past. i asked the others if they saw it and they all answered "no".
     i continued to watch the sky and failed to see any other unusual activity.
     some time later, i saw the exact same thing again but the location and date of that sighting escapes me.
content.summary: Green light traveling at high speed

content.detailedDescription:
i was sitting on the edge of a pool at my mother in laws house playing with my 5 yr old son, raising and lowering him in the water with my legs. when my son said to me " daddy, whats that in the sky?" and pointer right at it, up and beyond my left shoulder. i looked over my shoulder and seen a long white tubular object, but some what oddly boxed, it was hard to make out, and there was what seemed to be a black void in the middle. 
 so i got up out of the pool with my 5 yr old son and had him follow me closer to the edge of the yard to get a better look....I looked for wings, none. i listened for sound, none. it moved fairly fast, but not faster than a jet, more like a plane, but quiet....Like it was floating. it seemed to make a slight turn coming from the east to west, and then heading north west. there was no con trail. it wasnt very high, probably 2000 ft. hard to guess, but it was below some clouds passing by. 
 as it proceeded to cross the sky / horizon it shinned white bright, like clean snow. but the middle was pitch black, with what seemed like highlighted areas...Like ribs on a construction tube, going horizontal. my son and i watched it disappear beyond our view. i was excited to see something like this, but it wasnt my first time. 
 and after we got back to the pool i started thinking, my son and always say "look at the plane, look at the helicopter." this time he asked me, "daddy whats that in the sky?"
content.summary: It was a bright white object that looked like two long containers attached in middle by something black.

content.detailedDescription:
While outside having my last cigarette and allowing the dog to go pee before bed, i watched a silver sphere silently float along from the hills in the distance toward my back yard at a height of about 100 m from the ground, the sphere moved level with me at a distance of about 100 yrds away and carried on in a straight line toward the other horison a distance of about 20 miles. i went to my upstairs room to continue watching the object,
it was about the size of a compact car (bmw mini sized) and completely silver (possibly brushed steel appearance) it was un affected by wind (gentle breeze blowing) and made no noise.
it moved in a staight line from when i started to observe it.And did not change hight from the ground or speed.(height and speed were constant)
although the dog did not see the object , he bayed to go into the house and scratched at the door i was standing by (which was closed) to go in the house. just prior to me loosing sight of the object and going into watch from an upstairs room. something i find unusual as the dog usually gets pre occupied sniffing for cat evidence in the garden, he is usually keen to stay out as long as possible, not wanting to come in when called.

i have seen the same object many years ago and recall seeing this or a similar object in the late 1980s while on holiday with my parents in southern england, while travelling on the highway (motorway).On this ocasion it passed over a service area in a similar quiet constant speed and height fashion, only being seen by my family, several hundred people at the area did not notice the object. and i do recall it passing over the motorway over a truck which must have created huge draft at high speed, but the object was un moved.


i live in a densly populated area,in a row of old town, terraced houses.(the houses are around 200 yrs old an all occupied.)
the incident happened aound 15 mins ago.I could hear neighbours talking at the time through an open window about 2 mtrs from where i was standing.
we have had thunder storms today although there are none at present, the weather is breezy and cloudy.It is fairly dark and the moon is the other side of the house to where i saw the object.
i noticed several high altitude plains travelling with landing lights flashing which were much much higher than this object.
the onject did not appear to have any effect on local street lighting which it passed over, however i noticed at the time that several evening birds suddenly stopped tweeting as it passed by.
i could also hear a police siren in the distance on the busy main road about 500 yeards away and heard the 11 oclock train pass by on the rail line about 200 yeard from my home. 
the time outside lasted around 45 seconds then i watched the object from upstairs for maybee another 20 seconds , before i lost sight of it.
i have just noticed that all the digital clocks in the house, microwave , cooker,and the video have started flashing as though there has been a power outage although i didnt notice this at the time, and may be unconnected.
content.summary: Silver sphere.

content.detailedDescription:
My friend and i were sitting around a fire and looking around the sky and a glowing sphere came straight up out of the woods and headed south for about a quarter mile and then headed due west and went up toward the sky and about a minute later another one came out of the same trees and took the same path as the first one. there were actually four witnesses that i talk to later. 

on july 7th at the same time at night, it happened again. the only difference was that they went east instead of west.
content.summary: Came out of trees and took off.

content.detailedDescription:
About 11a.M. this  morning (july 9,2007), while  watching planes  take  off  from  nearby  la guardia airport (queens,n.Y.C.)for about 10 to 15 min.(as  i usually do with my  binocculars) i trailed a u.S. air flight overhead for a few  seconds , until it faded off  to  the  west. looking  at  the  rear of  the plane ,i spot a silver/metalic like  reflection in  the  corner  of  my  view  to  the  right. its  not  interupting  the plane , but  would  be  considered  in its general  airspace.(or maybe  the plane is in "its" airspace :hmmmmm?)i watched  it  for a min. ,then lost  it  for  about  30 sec.S ,  then  spotted  it  again (appears  to  be  twirling , because  of  the  reflection of  the  sun on it-no lights!,
 no  sound!No exaust!) lost  it  again! (never  moved  binocculars  from object  2nd  time, but  still  ,it  disappeared!) [temp.90d/humid/blue sky] this  same  object i  saw  a  week  ago over a  cloud to  the s.E. and  for  the  first  time  june  20 ,2007 (reported to m.U.F.O.N.6/20/2007 @1:58 p.M./e.S.T.)------they  r  over  new  york  city  too --- always  thought  only  rural/country  areas-not!........Eye n the sky >>>>m1 from  the  bronx,nyc
content.summary: Looking @ u.S.Air  flight  overhead from n.Y.Citys laguardia airport taking  off-- silver/metalic object

content.detailedDescription:
I was seated at a table outside a starbucks located on u.S. hwy 17 (kings hwy) in cherry grove,sc. this hwy runs north/south along the south carolina coastline (myrtle beach areas, etc.).  i was seated, facing east approximately 1 mile from the beach.  the building was a few feet away on my right. as i drank my coffee, i glanced up (for no particular reason).  the object caught my eye as it came into view from south of the building.  i almost looked away (expecting it to be a jet aircraft) but instantly saw that it was different. 

     first i will describe it.  light silver in color.  no wings. no tail section. no colors. no writing. shape of tube or cylinder.  no lines (such as windows, doors).  no contrails, no exhaust, no noise.  no other objects were in the eastern sky.  beautiful, light silver color.  it had a slight shimmering appearance (similar to heat waves coming from a hot road).

     i studied it for approximately 12 seconds.  during that time it never varied its speed, attitude, altitude or heading (that i could tell).  it was about 55-60 degrees off eastern horizon, headed north, almost like following the coastline.      

     i could not take my eyes off of the object.  i stood up and moved around the table, blinked my eyes, removed and replaced my sunglasses.  i was seeing the object clearly, as it was.

     there were others sitting outside starbucks, on the eastern (front) side of the building, just around the corner from me (perhaps 30 feet away).  in a split second i realized that getting their attention so that i could have witnesses ( to what i was seeing ) really did not matter to me.  i did not want to take my eyes off of it.  it headed out of sight in a northern direction.  i was amazed ...And glad i got to see this.  i am hoping someone else on the eastern coast saw this object.  

     i know what this wasn't.  i just don't know what it was. i am thankful it appeared in a blue sky, and the middle of the afternoon.
content.summary: Light silver object  flew  from south to north in clear eastern sky . studied it for approximately 12 seconds. beautiful silver seemed almost to shimmer.

content.detailedDescription:
The ufo incident with aliens reported in alor islands, in july 1959. alor islands is located in northern of nusa tenggara timur province in indonesia. a retired policeman, alwi alnadad said that he handled a case of some strange beings that came there which shocked the inhabitants.

in that time, alwi alnadad was head of police office of alor islands area (the alor islands consist of two big islands, alor and pantar island. the incident was firstly reported in alor island). firstly, he didn't believe for the incident reported by some inhabitants. he even thinked that the story was non sense. but, the incident then were blew up sensationally for weeks.

it was reported that some strange beings appeared in the east side of alor island. their height is about 1,80 metres and their skin are reddish. their eyes looked like human eyes and their hair are white-wavy. they wore dark blue clothes and pants with long arm and high collar, belt with a grey cylinder stick, and black military boot. their appearing were seem to be too strange for the inhabitants. the inhabitants said that the strangers were suspicious and looked like searched for something.

the inhabitants then surrounded them and shooted with arrows. strangely, the arrows couldn't injury them. the strangers then jumped high away out of the surrounding. they disappeared and could not be traced.

some days later, a report said that some strange beings with dark blue clothes appeared in a village in southern alor island. there were six people which had same characteristics with what reported days before. some of them have beard. another report were came from pantar island (west alor island). some inhabitants said that the strange beings searched for something unclear.

next days later, a village in east of kalabahi city was stired with story that a villager was kidnapped by some people with dark blue clothes. the villager just went down from a sugar palm (enau) tree and he saw some beings surrounded him. he tried to run, but these strange people then pointed frontward their cylindric stick to him. soon he became paralyzed. he heard they spoke to each other that he could not understand the language. one of them showed him a circle thing like alarm clock. he was asked to watch the thing that he could see anything far away from it. he thinked it didn't make sense because there are jungle and high hills stretched in front of him. he then realized that the strangers want to made him as a guide. not for so long he then be released. in the next day, a six-year-old kid was kidnapped by the strangers. some inhabitants found him in the field frightened and confused.

the location of the villages which the stories reported were distantly apart and the inhabitants didn't recognize each other. but the report seemed to be the same.The police then took the case seriously, even it was blew up by some people. the case is described as disturbed the people of the villages. then, some policemen commanded by alwi alnadad were run and ready to arrest them dead or alive! 

the place where a kid was kidnapped were surrounded by the police in every angle. it because the reports said that the strangers appeared from there. in the midnight (around 00.00 am), some sound of fire explosion broke the silence. the strangers who were waited appeared. the strangers were in 13 metres away from the policemen. the policemen then shooted them unisonly. but strangely, no blood found in the place where the strangers stood, even dead body. the shoots were very close and came from every angle that somebody should injured or even dead. the police only found some trees fell down and footprints that only five metres in the distance and then ended. they have no idea how come the strangers disappear.

after the incident, there are many inhabitants saw a white-glowing oval flying object flew above the sea with high speed. it flew over the beach from west to the east side. after that, the story was slowly forgotten and still not be exposed yet. 


source book: salatun, j. (1982). ufo: salah satu masalah dunia masa kini {ufo: one of world problem in present day). jakarta, yayasan idayu (idayu foundation), page 49-51.
content.summary: Ufo and six aliens appeared in alor island, indonesia (1959)
content.locationName: Alor Island,East Nusa Ten, Nusa Tenggara Timur
